item.description:
Prana & Optimum Health Solution feature author, Karen Ranzi, speaking on:

"Eating for the A's"
    
-Information regarding toxic load leading to many childhood diseases
-Autoimmune diseases - Obesity, Asthma, Eczema, Psoriasis, Attention Deficit Disorder, Asperger's & Autism
-Early Development and Eating Pattern linked to Childhood Allergies, Ear Infections etc.
-Eating for the A's
-Lifestyle Healing Factors
-Working with Finicky Eaters
-Creating a Supportive Community

Author Karen Ranzi, M.A.,CCC-SLP, www. Superhealthychildren.com, is on a mission to educate and empower all those who care for children to make choices kids can eat for the desirable A's  Academic excellence, Awesome health, and Attentional Superiority. This powerful workshop is for everyone who wants to lead a healthier lifestyle and have the tools to help combat chronic disorders through living food lifestyle.
 
Karen Ranzi is an Author, Lecturer and Raw Food Consultant. She has authored "Creating Healthy Children: through attachment parenting and raw foods, and is a staff writer for "Vibrance Magazine", " Get Fresh" and " Super Raw Life" Magazine. Karen recently presented health and wellness workshops to enthusiastic audiences at Penn State University and South Carolina.   In addition to her work in nutrition, Karen holds a Masters degree in speech pathology from New York University, and is a speech therapist working with children of all ages for over 30 years, specializing with autistic children. Karen has been able to guide thousands toward developing excellent health with her passion and wisdom.

FREE  Admission!! All Welcome!!!
Space limited, come early.
item.name: Karen Ranzi "Eating for the A's" Lecture *FREE*
